description: The Suzaku Seven are now reunited, and now, the ceremony to summon Suzaku can now begin. However, now all is in danger, as the power which is controlling the deterioration of the world of the book has now reached its peak. With imminent destruction at hand, Taka, Chichiri, Tasuki, and the rest of the Suzaku Seven must now fight to protect the world they love, but it may take the appearance of someone unexpected to beat back the darkness that threatens to overcome them.
